title: Trying to get rare skins
body:
I'm trying to get rare skins (skins that are not always in the store, not including christmas and halloween skins, also not including skins like SKT and samsung galaxy skins)

Any ideas of how I can earn, or if there's anything I can do (legally) to earn any such skins?

replies.body:
here is a list of skins you will never be able to get unless you buy an account with said skin.


Rusty Blitzcrank
Urf the Manatee ( the non be one)
Triumphant Ryze (win an official League of Legends tournament)
King Rammus (awarded to players who participated in Closed Beta)
Judgment Kayle (awarded to players who played at least 10 matchmade games in Season 1)
UFO Corki (awarded to players for voting in the Reader's Choice Awards 2009)
Riot Squad Singed (2010 and 2011 events)
 PAX Twisted Fate (PAX 2009)
 PAX Jax (PAX East/Prime 2010 & PAX East 2011)
 PAX Sivir (PAX Prime 2011)
Silver Kayle (Retail Collector's Edition)
Black Alistar (Digital Collector's Edition - Preorder)
Human Ryze (Retail Collector's Edition - Preorder)

Thanks for your response Cheesyleeks

So, Rusty blitzcrank, urf the manatee, the pax skins, silver kayle, black alistair, human ryze would all be impossible for me to attain?

lol, funny... two days ago someone posted on facebook that they got rusty blitzcrank

because he owned all possible skins and for rune reward he was offered to chose from rusty blitz or other pax skins.. he chose rusty blitz

> [{quoted}](name=Canc,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=JNZEQsp6,comment-id=000000010002,timestamp=2017-11-17T18:30:59.449+0000)
>
> lol, funny... two days ago someone posted on facebook that they got rusty blitzcrank
> 
> because he owned all possible skins and for rune reward he was offered to chose from rusty blitz or other pax skins.. he chose rusty blitz

Is that an actual thing? If you own all available skins you get some rare? Wow never thought Riot would do that, but makes sense i guess.

> [{quoted}](name=Rodriguez The400,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=JNZEQsp6,comment-id=00000001,timestamp=2017-11-16T06:28:23.700+0000)
>
> Thanks for your response Cheesyleeks
> 
> So, Rusty blitzcrank, urf the manatee, the pax skins, silver kayle, black alistair, human ryze would all be impossible for me to attain?

Also along with King Rammus, ufo corki and Judgement kayle. I think you might be able to aquire Grey Warwick in an honour capsule, but thats at a long shot.

Triumphant Ryze (win an official League of Legends tournament)

this ryze is obtainable by participating in sumsoc's monthly tournament,,, just have to come out first ... even if it takes 12 months worth of tries... if you are desperate
Ok, I'm going to try find a way to participate in the tournament, cheers Canc!
I just got Medieval Twitch out of a blue capsule you get from leveling up so that's a thing...
What level did you get that on?

Mystery gifting skins from friends allow you to get "legacy skins" (skins that are not in the shop).

http://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/Champion_skin#Legacy

As pointed out by Cheesy most the "rare" skins are simply unavailable now no matter what you do.

Also grey warwick will be available soon if not now, he was part of refer a friend... i cant remember what they have going in order tp aquire him thoigh, but keep any eye out for em. Also the ali skin for lol on facebook if you need that. Joining lol fb page. Dunno if its that rare tho.

Thanks ThatsBS

Do you know when he is coming out? or would you be able to tell me how you know this?
I have the ali skin already, I wouldn't say it's rare
